content: this is a simple pattern that knits up quickly they are lots of fun to knit and make an adorable ornament to add to your tree hang around your house or give as a gift they are also a great way to use up left over yarn since they don t take very much to make the owls are worked in the round and use the three needle bind off method you will need us size 4 3 5 mm dpns small amount of worsted weight or similar yarn in desired colors stuffing crochet hook approximately us e4/ 3 50 mm needle buttons for eyes
